answers.answer: It's not a good idea to eat that many sweets because you could make your baby more prone to diabetes when he grows a little older, and because you yourself could increase your chances of diabetes.  Sugar is a pretty addictive substance, not good for us in concentrated amounts (like a candy bar or sugar in a glass of milk).  Have you been tested for diabetes?

Lol, I want sweet stuff this pregnancy too so my mum thinks it will be a girl. Got to love old wives tales. Just keep in mind everything in moderation and try to think of what nutritional value the food you eat have for you and baby.
Don't supposed to eat sweets not good for the baby

question: Lately I Been Eating Candy Or Drinking Milk With Sugar & My Auntie Would Tell Me That My Baby Is Going To Come Out A Lighter Color Because Of All The Sweets I'm Eating & Drinking. Is It Bad To Eat So Much Sweets?Btw I Drink It Down With Water After.
title: Loving Sweets
